data.title: Chances of war with India are real, says Pakistan's Defence Minister; vows to 'achieve better result than before'
data.text:
Synopsis

Pakistan's Defence Minister Khawaja Asif has once again resorted to aggressive rhetoric against India, saying that the "chances of war with India are real" and claiming he was "not denying that possibility."
data.summary: SynopsisPakistan's Defence Minister Khawaja Asif has once again resorted to aggressive rhetoric against India, saying that the "chances of war with India are real" and claiming he was "not denying that possibility."
